summary: This is an email chain from November 2018 discussing the Jeff Epstein matter, initiated by an Assistant United States Attorney who shares a news article about Epstein's non-prosecution agreement in a financial fraud case and suggests a call to determine the way forward.

persons.name: Jeff Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses gathering information on the 'Jeff Epstein matter' and references a Miami Herald article about his cooperation in a financial fraud case and non-prosecution.

persons.name: Tommy
persons.context: Addressed in the email with a question about whether he has seen the Miami Herald article on Epstein.

events.title: Email discussion on Epstein matter
events.description: An email chain is initiated to discuss the Jeff Epstein matter, suggesting a call to determine the way forward after gathering information.

keyFacts: The email references a Miami Herald article about Jeff Epstein cooperating in a financial fraud case and receiving a non-prosecution agreement.
An Assistant United States Attorney and Human Trafficking Co-Coordinator for the Southern District of New York is involved in the discussion.
The email chain suggests a call to determine the way forward regarding the Epstein matter, indicating ongoing interest or investigation in late 2018.
